title: I am interested to learn more about world wars. what books I should start to read that will be easy to understand? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you don’t know much about it, I would suggest starting with Remarque’s All Quiet on the Western Front, that’s a must read. Memoirs are also good: Junger’s Storm of Steel, Luck’s Panzer Commander, Wilson’s If You Survive, Bradley’s A Soldier’s Story. There are a lot of books.
